User story / Acceptance Criteria: Low-maintenance options
Description: As a potential customer, I want to find out which plants are easiest to care for so that I can purchase low-maintenance options.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Plant care tips
Description: As a plant owner, I want to access care instructions easily so that I can keep my plant alive longer.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Plant care tools
Description: As a plant owner, I want to have the right tools to care for my plant so that I can keep it healthy and beautiful.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Watering reminders
Description: As a plant owner, I want to remember when to water my plants so that I don't under- or overwater them.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Expert help and advice
Description: As a plant owner, I want to get expert help and advice quickly so that I know what to do if my plant gets sick.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Return Policy
Description: As a customer, I want a hassle-free way to return my order so that I can be sure I have the right plant for me.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Bonsai Selection
Description: As a potential customer, I want to be able to select from a variety of different Bonsai trees so that I can pick the exact type I want.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Bonsai Shipping
Description: As a customer, I want to know that my tree will be shipped securely so that it arrives in good condition.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Bonsai Styles
Description: As a new Bonsai tree owner, I want to learn about different Bonsai styles so I can decide which is right for my tree.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Bonsai Tools
Description: As a Bonsai tree owner, I want to have the right tools to care for my tree so I can shape and style it properly.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Bonsai History
Description: As a Bonsai tree owner, I want to learn about the Bonsai history and traditions so that I can better appreciate my tree.

User story / Acceptance Criteria: Bonsai Techniques
Description: As a Bonsai tree owner, I want to learn how to shape and style my tree so that I can control its growth.
